== Installation ==
* Clone the repository
* Run `npm install`
* Run `npm run build`
* blank-theme.zip is generated in the `/deploy` folder
* Uncompress blank-theme.zip to the `/wp-content/themes` directory, or install the theme through the WordPress themes screen directly.

== Modify ==
* Clone the repository
* Run `npm install`
* Run `npm run watch`
* CSS is located in the `/css` folder and subfolders. The main file is `/css/style.css`. Do not edit directly `./style.css`
* JS is located in the /js folser and subfolders. The main file is `/js/scripts.js`. Do not edit directly `/js/scripts-bundled.js`

== Changelog ==

= 0.0.1 =
* First version
